name: Return Dev Sandbox
description: Return is a first person shooter that combines fast and fluid parkour, metroidvania styled world exploration, environmental puzzle solving, and freeform item use similar to a Zelda game, set inside a complex mechanical ecosystem with enemies that have unique behaviors and relationships. The full game will feature a story mode (more info coming soon) taking place in a large, twisting environment, and unlockable challenge maps meant to test players' skill.
